welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started on your AI literacy journey [Japanese]

step1.title: Discover Your Path [Japanese]
step1.description: AI Square helps you understand and master AI literacy [Japanese]
step1.content: We'll help you identify your strengths and areas for growth through personalized assessments and guided learning experiences. [Japanese]
step1.assessmentDesc: Discover your current AI knowledge level [Japanese]
step1.learningDesc: Get tailored recommendations based on your goals [Japanese]

step2.title: Four Core Domains [Japanese]
step2.description: Master the essential areas of AI literacy [Japanese]
step2.content: Our comprehensive framework covers everything you need to know about working with AI effectively and responsibly. [Japanese]

step3.title: Start Your Journey [Japanese]
step3.description: Begin with an assessment and unlock your potential [Japanese]
step3.content: Ready to discover your AI literacy level and get personalized learning recommendations? [Japanese]
step3.benefit1: Detailed assessment of your AI knowledge [Japanese]

goals.title: What would you like to achieve? [Japanese]
goals.subtitle: Select your learning goals to get personalized recommendations [Japanese]

understand.title: Understand AI Fundamentals [Japanese]
understand.description: Learn the basics of AI, machine learning, and how AI systems work [Japanese]

create.title: Create Content with AI [Japanese]
create.description: Use AI tools for writing, design, art, and creative projects [Japanese]

analyze.title: Analyze Data with AI [Japanese]
analyze.description: Apply AI for data analysis, insights, and decision-making [Japanese]

build.title: Build AI Solutions [Japanese]
build.description: Develop and implement AI systems and applications [Japanese]

teach.title: Teach AI to Others [Japanese]
teach.description: Educate and guide others in understanding and using AI [Japanese]

ethical.title: Ensure Ethical AI Use [Japanese]
ethical.description: Understand and implement responsible AI practices [Japanese]

goals.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one learning goal [Japanese]
goals.helpText: Don't worry, you can always change these later in your profile settings. [Japanese]
